chapters.title: Chapter 3: Practice
chapters.info: Myrelle Berengari, p. 50—Accepted from Altara. She earned the great serpent ring the same year Moiraine and Siuan earned theirs. Olive-skinned and beautiful, she is almost as tall as Siuan. She is gregarious and mercurial, with a boisterous sense of humor and a worse temper than Moiraine. Moiraine and Myrelle began novice training with heated words, but they eventually became close friends.
